title: Animaniacs: A Gigantic Adventure 1999
description:
Game Details
-----------------
Media: 1 x EXE
Platform: Windows
ESBR Rating: Everyone
Languages: English
Genre: Action, Platformer
Release Date: 15th June 1999
Developed by: EAI Interactive

Game Description
-----------------------
This is a side-scrolling platformer based on the tv animated show characters. Yakko, Wakko, and Dot have to find some movie classics that have been hidden by Warner Bros. CEO, Thaddeus J. Plotz, as well as missing classic posters and awards. Going through the studio's back lots to an ocean cruiser set, the trio must go through 11 levels with 3D environments ranging from the different areas on the ship to movie sets based on famous films such as 'Jurassic Pickings,' 'Invasion Earth' and 'Frank's Stein.' while avoiding obstacles and enemies along the way. There's three difficulty levels and a powerful boss character in each level must be defeated with the help of some creative weapons.

System Requirements
---------------------------
166 MHz processor
Microsoft Windows 95/98
32MB RAM
2MB of free disk space
4x CD-ROM
2MB PCI video adapter with DirectX compatible drivers
16-Bit Windows compatible sound card with DirectX compatible drivers
Microsoft compatible mouse gamepad, joystick, or keyboard
DirectX version 6.0
28.8 modem speed for internet play

Install
--------
1. Extract animaniacs-a-gigantic-adventure.exe to your preferred location. If you do not have a tool to do this, 7-Zip can be used.

2. Run animaniacs.exe to start the game.
